National.name: Alpha Phi Omega
National.description: coed national fraternity (with independent organizations in United States and the Philippines)

National.name: Gamma Sigma Sigma
National.description: national sorority, males admitted, primarily female

National.name: Tau Beta Sigma
National.description: Coed National Honorary Band Sorority; Founded March 26, 1946

National.name: Upsilon Phi Upsilon fraternity
National.description: Founded March 21, 1990 at Southern University and A&M College

Local/Regional.name: Alpha Delta
Local/Regional.description: local, strictly male, founded at University of Maine (formerly the Sigma Xi chapter of Alpha Phi Omega)

Local/Regional.name: Gamma Pi Alpha sorority
Local/Regional.description: local, strictly female, founded at Tuskegee University in 1994

Local/Regional.name: Rho Pi Alpha fraternity
Local/Regional.description: local, strictly male, founded at Tuskegee University in 1993 {defunct}, Beta chapter at Michigan State University {defunct}, Gamma chapter at Savannah State University {active}n

Local/Regional.name: Alpha Tau Mu fraternity
Local/Regional.description: coed regional, founded at Tuskegee University on September 2, 2009, Beta chapter at Auburn University on April 21, 2014

Non-collegiate.name: Epsilon Sigma Alpha
Non-collegiate.description: international service organization (coed collegiate division also exists)

Non-collegiate.name: Independent Order of Odd Fellows
Non-collegiate.description: non-collegiate international service fraternity for men and women whether professional or college students

Philippines.name: Alpha Phi Omega
Philippines.description: co-ed national (with independent organizations in United States and the Philippines)
